name: ffmpeg-helper
description: A Node.js module that provides an interface for executing platform-dependent binaries on multiple architectures (x64 and arm64) across macOS, Linux, and Windows. The module determines the underlying OS and architecture and provides the appropriate binary for execution.

scripts.postinstall: chmod -R +x ffmpeg-darwin-arm64.app ffmpeg-darwin-x64.app && chmod +x bin.mjs linux-arm linux-arm64 linux-ia32 linux-x64 win32-ia32.exe win32-x64.exe test.sh

author: Joel Lof <joel.lof@icloud.com> (https://joellof.com/)
